description.value:
Character gains Lightning Reflexes, Rapid Reaction, Unnatural Agility(1), and Unnatural Willpower for Toughness Bonus Rounds. Afterwards suffer 1d5 Nonpermenant Toughness Damage after effects pass.

Requirements

Rare on the Gates of Moment.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
